name: Arcafire
description:
Arcafire is a competitive local multiplayer Pong dueling game. Its Pong with a modern intese fast-paced dueling twist.

Arcafire was developed and designed for CalCade Jam, Calgary Game Developer Association first sponsored arcade cabinet Jam.

Credits:

@EvilObjective

@JumboOrange

@tehPHEN

Controls (Keyboard/Arcade):

Player 1:

A/D - Move
F/T - Shoot
R/G - Sprint

Player 2:

Left/Right Arrow- Move
J/I - Shoot
K/U - Sprint
